main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book documented a sighting of a blue-white groundish object that broke into three parts and traveled west at a high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed by a traffic controller at Idlewild airport, along with TWA Flight 629 and Eastern on final approach
The sighting occurred at dusk on 26th September 1958
Surface winds and weather conditions were detailed in the report
A possible explanation was suggested as engine exhaust by Airdrome Officer Captain Fred Perry
The object was noted to have instantaneous movement, covering a distance in three seconds
witnesses: Traffic controller at Idlewild, TWA Flight 629, Airdrome Officer Captain Fred Perry
